description: When I’m summoned, give me +1|+0 and <link=keyword.Elusive><sprite name=Elusive><style=Keyword>Elusive</style></link> this round.
descriptionRaw: When I’m summoned, give me +1|+0 and Elusive this round.
flavorText: "They say you don't speak to save others from the weight of your knowledge. Hmm... I bet you just got tired of answering questions." - Ahri
name: Woodland Keeper

description: Summon <link=keyword.Ephemeral><sprite name=Ephemeral><style=Keyword>Ephemeral</style></link> copies of the 3 <link=vocab.Strongest><style=Vocab>strongest</style></link> followers you've <link=keyword.Recall><style=Keyword>Recalled</style></link> this game.
descriptionRaw: Summon Ephemeral copies of the 3 strongest followers you've Recalled this game.
flavorText: Memories have fangs.
name: Children of the Forest

description: Each round, the first time you <link=keyword.Recall><style=Keyword>Recall</style></link> a follower, summon an exact <link=keyword.Ephemeral><sprite name=Ephemeral><style=Keyword>Ephemeral</style></link> copy of it.
descriptionRaw: Each round, the first time you Recall a follower, summon an exact Ephemeral copy of it.
flavorText: Mystery is a greater thing than its conclusion.
name: Tail-Cloak Matriarch

description: <link=vocab.NexusStrike><style=Vocab>Nexus Strike</style></link>: <link=keyword.Recall><style=Keyword>Recall</style></link> me.
descriptionRaw: Nexus Strike: Recall me.
flavorText: If one is to venerate the hunt, one must pause to weep for the hunted.
name: The Mourned

description: Summon a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Liminal Guardian</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Summon a Liminal Guardian.
flavorText: The forest needed a guardian, someone who could stand sentry at its borders for years, maybe centuries, without moving. Gai'sh was an eager volunteer and promptly proved his dedication with a ten-year nap.
name: Nine Lives

description:
When I'm summoned, summon a random 1 cost follower from your regions.
When I'm <link=keyword.Recall><style=Keyword>Recalled</style></link>, transform me into <link=card.cardRef><style=AssociatedCard>Nine Lives</style></link>.
descriptionRaw:
When I'm summoned, summon a random 1 cost follower from your regions.
When I'm Recalled, transform me into Nine Lives.
flavorText: "My best quality? I sleep like a rock."
name: Liminal Guardian

description: Pick an ally being targeted by enemy <link=keyword.Fast><sprite name=Fast><style=Keyword>Fast</style></link> spells, <link=keyword.Slow><sprite name=Slow><style=Keyword>Slow</style></link> spells, or <link=keyword.Skill><sprite name=SkillMark><style=Keyword>Skills</style></link> with only 1 target. Stop them.
descriptionRaw: Pick an ally being targeted by enemy Fast spells, Slow spells, or Skills with only 1 target. Stop them.
flavorText: An arrow knows neither the intent of the hunter, nor the worth of its prey.
name: Memory's Cloak

description: When an allied landmark is destroyed, deal 1 to the <link=keyword.Weakest><style=Keyword>weakest</style></link> enemy.
descriptionRaw: When an allied landmark is destroyed, deal 1 to the weakest enemy.
levelupDescription: You've destroyed 4+ allied landmarks this game.<style=Variable></style>
levelupDescriptionRaw: You've destroyed 4+ allied landmarks this game.
flavorText:
"The two were once friends, but time and affinity made them into brothers. Certainly Azir could not have achieved all that he was able without Xerath by his side." 
- Scribe Kah'nir, History of the Ascended Host
name: Xerath

description:
Destroy an allied landmark or one of your mana gems to deal 4 to a unit.
Create a <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Xerath</style></link> in your deck.
descriptionRaw:
Destroy an allied landmark or one of your mana gems to deal 4 to a unit.
Create a Xerath in your deck.
flavorText: "A small sacrifice in exchange for great power." - Xerath
name: Xerath's Rite of the Arcane

description: Destroy one of your mana gems to deal 4 to a unit.
descriptionRaw: Destroy one of your mana gems to deal 4 to a unit.
flavorText: "Pitiful." - Xerath
name: Xerath's Rite of the Arcane

description: Destroy an allied landmark to deal 4 to a unit.
descriptionRaw: Destroy an allied landmark to deal 4 to a unit.
flavorText: "Pitiful." - Xerath
name: Xerath's Rite of the Arcane

description: When an allied landmark is destroyed, deal 3 to the <link=keyword.Weakest><style=Keyword>weakest</style></link> enemy.
descriptionRaw: When an allied landmark is destroyed, deal 3 to the weakest enemy.
levelupDescription: You've <link=vocab.SunDiscRestore><style=Vocab>restored the Sun Disc</style></link>.
levelupDescriptionRaw: You've restored the Sun Disc.
flavorText:
"If only Xerath had known that Azir planned to free him of his bondage, it might have prevented Shurima's demise... but some part of a mortal's humanity is lost when they Ascend, and any forgiveness or leniency was quickly erased from Xerath's mind." 
- Scribe Kah'nir, History of the Ascended Host
name: Xerath

description:
When an allied landmark is destroyed or <link=vocab.RoundStart><style=Vocab>Round Start</style></link>: Deal 5 to the <link=keyword.Weakest><style=Keyword>weakest</style></link> enemy or the enemy Nexus if there are none.
If an enemy unit would die, <link=keyword.Obliterate><style=Keyword>Obliterate</style></link> it instead.
descriptionRaw:
When an allied landmark is destroyed or Round Start: Deal 5 to the weakest enemy or the enemy Nexus if there are none.
If an enemy unit would die, Obliterate it instead.
flavorText:
"For years he sowed seeds of revenge, plotting against Azir in the dark of the Emperor's Tomb. Xerath would see a new Shurima made in his own image, gathering the acolytes who had studied his arcane magics to serve as his army. Now, he marches on Shurima just as Azir has revived it." 
- Scribe Kah'nir, History of the Ascended Host
name: Xerath

description: When I'm summoned, if you've destroyed 4+ allied landmarks this game, grant your champions <link=vocab.Everywhere><style=Vocab>everywhere</style></link> +2|+2 and <link=keyword.Overwhelm><sprite name=Overwhelm><style=Keyword>Overwhelm</style></link>. <style=Variable></style>
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, if you've destroyed 4+ allied landmarks this game, grant your champions everywhere +2|+2 and Overwhelm.
flavorText: The Herald spread her arms wide as she lifted her face to the sun, which hung bloody and red above Shurima. "Hail, the Magus Ascendant," she breathed beatifically, her voice echoing off the ring of ruined columns. "Hail, Xerath!"
name: Herald of the Magus

description: <link=keyword.Last Breath><sprite name=LastBreath><style=Keyword>Last Breath</style></link>: Summon a <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Sarcophagus</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Last Breath: Summon a Sarcophagus.
flavorText: As richly appointed as the tomb was, it did little good for the banished and the dead.
name: Endless Devout

flavorText: Xerath's new army would make better use of the tomb's many artifacts, turning useless extravagance into a powerful conduit for the Magus Ascendant's magic.
name: Restored Devout

description: <link=vocab.Countdown><style=Vocab>Countdown</style></link><style=Variable></style> 3 or when I'm destroyed: summon a <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Restored Devout</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Countdown 3 or when I'm destroyed: summon a Restored Devout.
flavorText: The Tomb of Emperors is no less lavish for serving as Xerath's prison. Indeed, the beauty of the place and its trappings is nothing if not a reminder of the inhabitants' fall from grace - a gilded prison.
name: Sarcophagus

description: Give an enemy <nobr>-2|-0</nobr> this round. An ally and that enemy <link=vocab.Strike><style=Vocab>strike</style></link> each other.
descriptionRaw: Give an enemy -2|-0 this round. An ally and that enemy strike each other.
flavorText: "A traveler who does not fear the desert, does not know the desert." - Shuriman adage
name: Desert Duel

description: <link=vocab.Countdown><style=Vocab>Countdown 3</style></link> or when I'm summoned or destroyed: Grant the <link=vocab.Strongest><style=Vocab>strongest</style></link> ally +2|+0.
descriptionRaw: Countdown 3 or when I'm summoned or destroyed: Grant the strongest ally +2|+0.
flavorText: Sparking, crackling pillars rose from the sands, subverted places of power that would reinforce Xerath's already powerful army.
name: Obelisk of Power

description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: Destroy an allied landmark to grant allied <link=card.selfRef><style=AssociatedCard>Ruinous Acolytes</style></link> <link=vocab.Everywhere><style=Vocab>everywhere</style></link> +1|+1.
descriptionRaw: Play: Destroy an allied landmark to grant allied Ruinous Acolytes everywhere +1|+1.
flavorText: All of Xerath's acolytes gave something of themselves in exchange for power, but his most powerful devotees were hardly more than husks of their former selves, serving as both conduit and power source for their new emperor's energy.
name: Ruinous Acolyte

description: Summon a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Stasis Statue</style></link> to store all allied units and landmarks that died or were destroyed this round inside.
descriptionRaw: Summon a Stasis Statue to store all allied units and landmarks that died or were destroyed this round inside.
flavorText: Magical energy does not dissipate. It is merely repurposed.
name: Servitude of Desolation

description: <link=vocab.Countdown><style=Vocab>Countdown</style></link><style=Variable></style> 3 or when I'm destroyed: Summon a <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Dami'yin the Unbound</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Countdown 3 or when I'm destroyed: Summon a Dami'yin the Unbound.
flavorText: "At each place of power shall an obelisk be raised, an instrument through which the Magus Ascendant may draw the power from beneath the sands." - Herald of the Magus
name: Risen Altar

flavorText: "At each place of power shall we draw forth the magical energy of the land, and in so doing, bolster our great emperor's armies!" - Herald of the Magus
name: Dami'yin the Unbound

description: Create a <link=card.create1><style=AssociatedCard>Ruinous Acolyte</style></link> or an <link=card.create2><style=AssociatedCard>Obelisk of Power</style></link> in hand.
descriptionRaw: Create a Ruinous Acolyte or an Obelisk of Power in hand.
flavorText: "I will fashion Shurima in MY image." - Xerath
name: Construct of Desolation

description: When I'm summoned, draw 1. If you drew a landmark, repeat this effect.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, draw 1. If you drew a landmark, repeat this effect.
flavorText: The horizon before her sang with energy. Where others saw sand and silt, she saw the ley lines, blinding lattices of pure energy that were hers for the taking.
name: Sandseer

description: Give an ally +2|+1 this round or destroy an allied landmark to give an ally +4|+2 this round.
descriptionRaw: Give an ally +2|+1 this round or destroy an allied landmark to give an ally +4|+2 this round.
flavorText: "I will rip the power from the desert, and destroy those who would oppose me!" - Xerath
name: Unleashed Energy

description: Give an ally +2|+1 this round.
descriptionRaw: Give an ally +2|+1 this round.
flavorText: "I will rip the power from the desert, and destroy those who would oppose me!" - Xerath
name: Unleashed Energy

description: Destroy an allied landmark to give an ally +4|+2 this round.
descriptionRaw: Destroy an allied landmark to give an ally +4|+2 this round.
flavorText: "I will rip the power from the desert, and destroy those who would oppose me!" - Xerath
name: Unleashed Energy

description: When an allied landmark is destroyed, grant me +1|+1.
descriptionRaw: When an allied landmark is destroyed, grant me +1|+1.
flavorText: The acolytes had been accomplished before they sought out Xerath. Now that they had studied what he had once studied himself, they were unstoppable.
name: Waste Walker

description: Destroy an allied landmark or one of your mana gems to deal 4 to a unit.
descriptionRaw: Destroy an allied landmark or one of your mana gems to deal 4 to a unit.
flavorText: "A small sacrifice in exchange for great power." - Xerath
name: Rite of the Arcane

description: Destroy an allied landmark to deal 4 to a unit.
descriptionRaw: Destroy an allied landmark to deal 4 to a unit.
flavorText: "Pitiful." - Xerath
name: Rite of the Arcane

description: Destroy one of your mana gems to deal 4 to a unit.
descriptionRaw: Destroy one of your mana gems to deal 4 to a unit.
flavorText: "Pitiful." - Xerath
name: Rite of the Arcane

description: When I'm summoned or discarded, create a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Twinblade Revenant</style></link> in hand.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned or discarded, create a Twinblade Revenant in hand.
flavorText: The Demacians crawled to their ramparts to find death itself descending upon their walls. Though they were able to fell some of the Gray Legion, the dark tide of war soon proved unstoppable.
name: Lost Soul

description:
To play, discard 1.
When I'm discarded, summon an exact copy of me.
descriptionRaw:
To play, discard 1.
When I'm discarded, summon an exact copy of me.
flavorText:
"We have an irregularity in our midst. Though most of those we revive abhor their return to life, this fellow seems to both understand his lot, and revels in the subsequent opportunities. Curious."
- Notes from Dr. Esslanger
name: Reborn Grenadier

description: When I'm summoned, grant <link=keyword.Reckless><sprite name=Reckless><style=Keyword>Can't Block</style></link> to the <link=keyword.Weakest><style=Keyword>weakest</style></link> enemy.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, grant Can't Block to the weakest enemy.
flavorText:
"It was the good Lady's suggestion that finally woke the creature. A small dose of iodine salt into the bloodstream, lethal to any mortal, but simply agonizing to our patient. To the risen, there is no greater motivator than pain."
- Notes from Dr. Esslanger
name: Risen Reckoner

description: When I'm discarded, grant your <link=vocab.Strongest><style=Vocab>strongest</style></link> ally +2|+0.
descriptionRaw: When I'm discarded, grant your strongest ally +2|+0.
flavorText: As Lady Noradi's powers grew, she pondered whether her powers would take root in the corpses lining Noxus's oldest tombs. She found the light of life a mere flicker in the husks, but from those wilting flames, the shadows of war still danced.
name: Ancient Warmonger

description:
When I'm discarded, grant your <link=vocab.Strongest><style=Vocab>strongest</style></link> ally <link=keyword.Overwhelm><sprite name=Overwhelm><style=Keyword>Overwhelm</style></link> and place me into your deck.
I have +1|+0 for each card you've discarded this game (Max +7|+0).
descriptionRaw:
When I'm discarded, grant your strongest ally Overwhelm and place me into your deck.
I have +1|+0 for each card you've discarded this game (Max +7|+0).
levelupDescription: You've discarded or summoned 35+ Power<style=Variable></style>.
levelupDescriptionRaw: You've discarded or summoned 35+ Power.
flavorText: Sion glimpsed fleeting flashes of opaque memories. Legions standing before him. Accolades. Crowns. War. A king's deathrattle. The Great Nothing. Blood. But just as soon as they floated by, they floated past, pale ribbons in the wind.
name: Sion

description:
To play, discard a card.
Summon a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Reborn Grenadier</style></link> and give it +2|+0 this round.
descriptionRaw:
To play, discard a card.
Summon a Reborn Grenadier and give it +2|+0 this round.
flavorText: "Rise again, my child..." - Dr. Esslanger, Pensive Physician
name: Salt And Stitches

description:
When I'm summoned, grant <link=keyword.Reckless><sprite name=Reckless><style=Keyword>Can't Block</style></link> to the <link=keyword.Weakest><style=Keyword>weakest</style></link> enemy.
<link=keyword.Last Breath><sprite name=LastBreath><style=Keyword>Last Breath</style></link>: Create a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Risen Reckoner</style></link> in hand.
descriptionRaw:
When I'm summoned, grant Can't Block to the weakest enemy.
Last Breath: Create a Risen Reckoner in hand.
flavorText:
"The first minotaurs I revived were docile, useless beasts. Neither the thrum of war nor the threat of death could stir their senses."
- Notes from Dr. Esslanger
name: Fallen Reckoner

description: <link=vocab.Reputation><style=Vocab>Reputation</style></link>: I cost 3. <style=Variable></style> Summon 2 <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Trifarian Gloryseekers</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Reputation: I cost 3.  Summon 2 Trifarian Gloryseekers.
flavorText: Those seeking glory will stop at nothing to find it.
name: For Glory!

description: When I'm discarded, create a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Risen Rider</style></link> in hand.
descriptionRaw: When I'm discarded, create a Risen Rider in hand.
flavorText:
"It was only after rubbing the rider's armor with Blackshade leaves that they were spared from the basilisk's viciousness. The plants are native to the hinterlands, just as the beasts, and are as pungent as they are poisonous."
- Notes from Dr. Esslanger
name: Fallen Rider

flavorText: "Upon the night, death rode." - The Lady of Blood
name: Risen Rider

description: When I'm summoned, <link=vocab.Rally><style=Vocab>Rally</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, Rally.
flavorText:
"Though the fog lingers as we first wake Sion, the full spectrum of war stirs a life within him that is both furious and reluctant to end."
- Notes from Dr. Esslanger
name: Sion Returned

description:
<link=keyword.Last Breath><sprite name=LastBreath><style=Keyword>Last Breath</style></link>: Summon <link=card.transform><style=AssociatedCard>Sion Returned</style></link>. 
When I'm discarded, grant your <link=vocab.Strongest><style=Vocab>strongest</style></link> ally <link=keyword.Overwhelm><sprite name=Overwhelm><style=Keyword>Overwhelm</style></link> and place me into your deck.
descriptionRaw:
Last Breath: Summon Sion Returned. 
When I'm discarded, grant your strongest ally Overwhelm and place me into your deck.
flavorText: Through the din of battle, he remembered. He remembered his life, a proud servant of Noxus. A revered general who gave his life felling Demacia's king. He remembered his death, and the empty expanse that followed. His was a good life, and a good death. But this... this was madness.
name: Sion

description:
To play, discard 1. Kill the <link=keyword.Weakest><style=Keyword>weakest</style></link> enemy.
Create a <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Sion</style></link> in your deck.
descriptionRaw:
To play, discard 1. Kill the weakest enemy.
Create a Sion in your deck.
flavorText: "Ally, enemy... I don't care." - Sion
name: Sion's Roar of the Slayer

description: To play, discard 1. Kill the <link=keyword.Weakest><style=Keyword>weakest</style></link> enemy.
descriptionRaw: To play, discard 1. Kill the weakest enemy.
flavorText: "Ally, enemy... I don't care." - Sion
name: Roar of the Slayer

description: Deal 3 to a unit and summon a <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Trifarian Shieldbreaker</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Deal 3 to a unit and summon a Trifarian Shieldbreaker.
flavorText: "Shieldbreaker!" - Sion
name: Weapons of the Lost

description: <link=keyword.Last Breath><sprite name=LastBreath><style=Keyword>Last Breath</style></link>: Create a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Lost Soul</style></link> in hand.
descriptionRaw: Last Breath: Create a Lost Soul in hand.
flavorText:
"The Demacians palpably lost their will to fight upon seeing our fallen--who were so selflessly cut down by those brave Vanguard--rise once more. Victory was never in question."
- Excerpt from the Lady of Blood's field report, recipient unknown
name: Twinblade Revenant

description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: Discard 1 to draw a unit.
descriptionRaw: Play: Discard 1 to draw a unit.
flavorText: Dr. Esslanger was once a respected and retiring physician who garnered his credible reputation through years of hard work. But it wasn't until a young noblewoman was brought to his study, her blood blackened by betrayal, that he truly began serving Noxus.
name: Grave Physician

description: When a non-<link=keyword.Fleeting><sprite name=Fleeting><style=Keyword>Fleeting</style></link> ally in hand is discarded, create a <link=keyword.Fleeting><sprite name=Fleeting><style=Keyword>Fleeting</style></link> copy of it in hand.
descriptionRaw: When a non-Fleeting ally in hand is discarded, create a Fleeting copy of it in hand.
flavorText: Under cover of night, Lady Faris Noradi led her Gray Legion out of the Noxian capital. It took three hard, bloody weeks, but they finally neared the small Demacian outpost her scouts had identified. It was time for the demonstration.
name: The Lady of Blood

description: Grant me +2|+1 once you've discarded 3+ cards this game. <style=Variable></style>
descriptionRaw: Grant me +2|+1 once you've discarded 3+ cards this game.
flavorText: "What could better instill loyalty in a would-be traitor than the sight of a butchered conspirator, brought back to fight under the Noxian banner? They will all serve, one way or another." - The Lady of Blood
name: Noble Rebel

description: When you play a spell, grant +1|+0 to the <link=keyword.Weakest><style=Keyword>weakest</style></link> other ally that isn't <link=keyword.Immobile><sprite name=Immobile><sprite name=Reckless><style=Keyword>Immobile</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: When you play a spell, grant +1|+0 to the weakest other ally that isn't Immobile.
levelupDescription: You've gained 8+ spell mana this game.<style=Variable></style>
levelupDescriptionRaw: You've gained 8+ spell mana this game.
flavorText:
"Have you said your goodbyes, young Tidecaller?"
"Yes, greatmother."
"Are you afraid?"
"...Yes, greatmother."
"Good. To be afraid is to be cautious. But trust yourself, as we trust you. Now, go. And may the currents keep you."
name: Nami

description:
Deal 2 randomly to an enemy or the enemy Nexus and create a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Flow</style></link> in hand.
Create a <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Nami</style></link> in your deck.
descriptionRaw:
Deal 2 randomly to an enemy or the enemy Nexus and create a Flow in hand.
Create a Nami in your deck.
flavorText: "Heed the tide's temper..." - Nami
name: Nami's Ebb

description: When you play a spell, grant +2|+1 to the <link=keyword.Weakest><style=Keyword>weakest</style></link> other ally that isn't <link=keyword.Immobile><sprite name=Immobile><sprite name=Reckless><style=Keyword>Immobile</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: When you play a spell, grant +2|+1 to the weakest other ally that isn't Immobile.
flavorText:
"Do you think she's far along in her journey?"
"We can only hope, Tama."
"I can see her now... Beautiful eyes glowing in the light of the moon, the shine of saltwater glistening on her scales."
"This burden... the fate of our people. It should not be hers alone."
"She is doing her part, as we are doing ours, Loto. All we can do is believe in her, and love her with all our hearts."
name: Nami

description: Deal 2 randomly to an enemy or the enemy Nexus and create a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Flow</style></link> in hand.
descriptionRaw: Deal 2 randomly to an enemy or the enemy Nexus and create a Flow in hand.
flavorText: "Heed the tide's temper..." - Nami
name: Ebb

description: Heal an ally or your Nexus 2, and create an <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Ebb and Flow</style></link> in hand.
descriptionRaw: Heal an ally or your Nexus 2, and create an Ebb and Flow in hand.
flavorText: "...And cherish the swell's calm." - Nami
name: Flow

description: Deal 2 randomly to an enemy or the enemy Nexus and heal an ally or your Nexus 2.
descriptionRaw: Deal 2 randomly to an enemy or the enemy Nexus and heal an ally or your Nexus 2.
flavorText: "I decide what the tide will bring." - Nami
name: Ebb and Flow

flavorText: "Sure, a few of 'em hunt us, like they hunt everything. But y'know, most landwalkers I meet are just looking to enjoy their time in the big blue, same as us. We're all just people."
name: Journeying Sandhopper

description: When you play a spell, give me +2|+0 this round.
descriptionRaw: When you play a spell, give me +2|+0 this round.
flavorText: "Many of our tribe find Loto somewhat unnerving. They see only a tireless fighter, and the distance in his troubled gaze. But I know what's truly in his heart--fear that he is not strong enough to save us... and extraordinary love." - Tama, Marai Songstress
name: Abyssal Guard

description: When you play 2 spells each round, grant other allies +1|+1. <style=Variable></style>
descriptionRaw: When you play 2 spells each round, grant other allies +1|+1.
flavorText: "LISTEN HERE, SOWDIER. I'LL HAVE YOU KNOW I HAVE OVA FWEE-HUNDWED CONFIRMED KWILLS AND I'M DA TOP ADMIWAL IN ALL DA MAWINE'S FORCES SO WHEN I SAY SWIM, YOU BETTA SWIM, OKAY? OKAY THANK YOU!"
name: Fleet Admiral Shelly

description: Deal 1 to two different randomly targeted enemies and create a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Crashing Wave</style></link> in your deck.
descriptionRaw: Deal 1 to two different randomly targeted enemies and create a Crashing Wave in your deck.
flavorText: "Oceans spill forth!" - Nami
name: Tidal Wave

description: Deal 2 to four different randomly targeted enemies and create a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Colossal Wave</style></link> in your deck.
descriptionRaw: Deal 2 to four different randomly targeted enemies and create a Colossal Wave in your deck.
flavorText: "Roiling seas engulf them!" - Nami
name: Crashing Wave

description: Deal 4 to all enemies and the enemy Nexus.
descriptionRaw: Deal 4 to all enemies and the enemy Nexus.
flavorText: "Rolling tides, heed my call!" - Nami
name: Colossal Wave

description:
If you would get a mana gem, instead refill your spell mana.
When you play a spell, create in hand a random spell that costs 3 or less and give it <link=keyword.Fleeting><sprite name=Fleeting><style=Keyword>Fleeting</style></link>.
descriptionRaw:
If you would get a mana gem, instead refill your spell mana.
When you play a spell, create in hand a random spell that costs 3 or less and give it Fleeting.
flavorText: To the Marai, the Leo'lei is a herald of great change. It is said each flourish of its graceful wings influences the flow of the tides.
name: Avatar of the Tides

description: When I'm summoned, summon a random 1 cost follower.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, summon a random 1 cost follower.
flavorText: The Marai rarely desire to venture far from home. But Ai'la was born with curiosity in her heart--and though she is bound by duty to her tribe, she spends each waking moment dreaming of the day she can truly be free.
name: Marai Warden

description: When I'm summoned, create 5 random 6+ cost spells in your deck and lower their cost to 3.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, create 5 random 6+ cost spells in your deck and lower their cost to 3.
flavorText: The Marai's ancestral home is protected by the celestial light of a moonstone. Every hundred years, its light begins to wane, and a new Tidecaller is tasked with finding another--for without it, the Marai people would be plunged into darkness, and fall prey to the horrors that lurk in the depths.
name: Marai Greatmother

description: When I'm summoned, if you've played a spell this round, grant me <link=keyword.Elusive><sprite name=Elusive><style=Keyword>Elusive</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, if you've played a spell this round, grant me Elusive.
flavorText:
"The ocean believes that the wave will return,
gives trust to the ebb, to the flow, to the churn.
So 'ere the wave crashes against the shore, 
the ocean delights in the crest's bold roar."
- A verse from 'Serenade for the Tidecaller'
name: Marai Songstress

description: Whenever your opponent draws, plant 1 <link=card.shuffle><style=AssociatedCard>Flashbomb Trap</style></link> randomly in the top 8 cards in the enemy deck.
descriptionRaw: Whenever your opponent draws, plant 1 Flashbomb Trap randomly in the top 8 cards in the enemy deck.
flavorText:
"Officer was witnessed pursuing suspect at a high speed into a trap of her own making. Following the arrest, officer proceeded to submit her own speeding citation and fine, claiming (somewhat dramatically) 'Justice is a two-way street.'" 
- Excerpt from a Warden beat report
name: Justice Rider

description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: Pick a spell in the top 5 cards of your deck and create an exact <link=keyword.Fleeting><sprite name=Fleeting><style=Keyword>Fleeting</style></link> copy in hand.
descriptionRaw: Play: Pick a spell in the top 5 cards of your deck and create an exact Fleeting copy in hand.
flavorText: Detectives are nothing without leads. An archivist's job is to collect every scrap of intel and create new possibilities where none previously existed.
name: Station Archivist

description: Summon 2 <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Forge Workers</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Summon 2 Forge Workers.
flavorText: "Shift change!" - Forge Chief
name: Assembly Line

description: Pick a player to discard their lowest cost card to draw 3.
descriptionRaw: Pick a player to discard their lowest cost card to draw 3.
flavorText: "Everything has a cost." - Corina Veraza
name: Most Wanted

flavorText: "Yeah so I've been 'elping Jayce an' them lot 'tinker around with this new thing. Powerformative technology, we call it. Truth be told, Jayce said I'll be listed as co-inventor once the documentation's done! Them bigwigs know where the real smarts is, eh?"
name: Forge Worker

description: When I'm summoned, draw <link=card.champ1><style=AssociatedCard>Jayce</style></link>. <link=keyword.AttackSkillMark><sprite name=SkillMark><style=Keyword>Attack</style></link>: Deal 1 to the enemy Nexus. For each 6+ cost spell you've played this game, increase it by 1.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, draw Jayce. Attack: Deal 1 to the enemy Nexus. For each 6+ cost spell you've played this game, increase it by 1.
flavorText:
"The magnanimous Albus Ferros has once again THRUST himself into the spotlight, dramatically outbidding Clans Cadwalder and Giopara for the rights to sponsor Jayce's Hexgate research. 'A fine day for Ferros is a fine day for Piltover', as the saying goes, and yesterday was a very fine day for Clan Ferros, indeed!"
- Excerpt from a sponsored spread in the Piltover Daily
name: Albus Ferros

description: Deal 1 to the enemy Nexus.
descriptionRaw: Deal 1 to the enemy Nexus.
flavorText: "First, the investment. Then, the dividend." - Albus Ferros
name: Ferros' Dividend

description: Deal 3 to an enemy or the enemy Nexus, and 3 to another.
descriptionRaw: Deal 3 to an enemy or the enemy Nexus, and 3 to another.
flavorText: "Firing!" - Jayce
name: Shock Blast

description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: Grant me <link=keyword.Quick Strike><sprite name=QuickStrike><style=Keyword>Quick Attack</style></link> or <link=keyword.Challenger><sprite name=Challenger><style=Keyword>Challenger</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Play: Grant me Quick Attack or Challenger.
levelupDescription: You've played two 6+ cost spells. <style=Variable></style> When I level up, create an <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Acceleration Gate</style></link> in hand.
levelupDescriptionRaw: You've played two 6+ cost spells.  When I level up, create an Acceleration Gate in hand.
flavorText:
"So, Rosa, as you know, this powerformative tech promises to change the world."
"Truly groundbreaking work, Jayce. The way those coinhiberators splice together. It's breathtaking."
"It sure is. All Axel's idea, too! Right, my good man?"
"Well, you know me, mate. Don't like to brag..."
name: Jayce

description: Each round, the first time you play a 6+ cost spell, copy it with the same targets.
descriptionRaw: Each round, the first time you play a 6+ cost spell, copy it with the same targets.
flavorText: "Cannon's primed, and hammer's engaged. This is going to be one for the history books, folks."
name: Jayce

description:
<link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: Grant me <link=keyword.Quick Strike><sprite name=QuickStrike><style=Keyword>Quick Attack</style></link> or <link=keyword.Challenger><sprite name=Challenger><style=Keyword>Challenger</style></link>.
Each round, the first time you play a 6+ cost spell, copy it with the same targets.
descriptionRaw:
Play: Grant me Quick Attack or Challenger.
Each round, the first time you play a 6+ cost spell, copy it with the same targets.
flavorText: "Cannon's primed, and hammer's engaged. This is going to be one for the history books, folks."
name: Jayce

description: Deal 3 to an enemy or the enemy Nexus, and 3 to another. Create a <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Jayce</style></link> in your deck.
descriptionRaw: Deal 3 to an enemy or the enemy Nexus, and 3 to another. Create a Jayce in your deck.
flavorText: "Firing!" - Jayce
name: Jayce's Shock Blast

levelupDescription: You've played two 6+ cost spells. <style=Variable></style> When I level up, create an <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Acceleration Gate</style></link> in hand.
levelupDescriptionRaw: You've played two 6+ cost spells.  When I level up, create an Acceleration Gate in hand.
flavorText:
"So, Rosa, as you know, this powerformative tech promises to change the world."
"Truly groundbreaking work, Jayce. The way those coinhiberators splice together. It's breathtaking."
"It sure is. All Axel's idea, too! Right, my good man?"
"Well, you know me, mate. Don't like to brag..."
name: Jayce

levelupDescription: You've played two 6+ cost spells. <style=Variable></style> When I level up, create an <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Acceleration Gate</style></link> in hand.
levelupDescriptionRaw: You've played two 6+ cost spells.  When I level up, create an Acceleration Gate in hand.
flavorText:
"So, Rosa, as you know, this powerformative tech promises to change the world."
"Truly groundbreaking work, Jayce. The way those coinhiberators splice together. It's breathtaking."
"It sure is. All Axel's idea, too! Right, my good man?"
"Well, you know me, mate. Don't like to brag..."
name: Jayce

description: Each round, the first time you play a 6+ cost spell, copy it with the same targets.
descriptionRaw: Each round, the first time you play a 6+ cost spell, copy it with the same targets.
flavorText: "Cannon's primed, and hammer's engaged. This is going to be one for the history books, folks."
name: Jayce

description: Give your allies +2|+0 and <link=keyword.Quick Strike><sprite name=QuickStrike><style=Keyword>Quick Attack</style></link> this round. If they already have it or <link=keyword.Double Strike><sprite name=DoubleStrike><style=Keyword>Double Attack</style></link>, give them a random keyword instead.
descriptionRaw: Give your allies +2|+0 and Quick Attack this round. If they already have it or Double Attack, give them a random keyword instead.
flavorText: "Gate is a go." - Jayce
name: Acceleration Gate

description: Deal 2 to a unit. If you've added 2+ cards to your hand this round, deal 3 to it instead.
descriptionRaw: Deal 2 to a unit. If you've added 2+ cards to your hand this round, deal 3 to it instead.
flavorText: "Better let 'em air out a minute. Greenies can't take the smell. But lemme tells ya... once you're accustomed, nothin' like it!" - Puffcap Peddler
name: Sump Fumes

description: Deal 2 to a unit and plant 2 <link=card.shuffle><style=AssociatedCard>Flashbomb Traps</style></link> randomly in the top 8 cards of the enemy deck.
descriptionRaw: Deal 2 to a unit and plant 2 Flashbomb Traps randomly in the top 8 cards of the enemy deck.
flavorText: "Here's MY calling card." - Caitlyn
name: Piltover Peacemaker

description: Give an ally +2|+0 this round. If you've added 2+ cards to your hand this round, give it <link=keyword.Elusive><sprite name=Elusive><style=Keyword>Elusive</style></link> this round.
descriptionRaw: Give an ally +2|+0 this round. If you've added 2+ cards to your hand this round, give it Elusive this round.
flavorText: "We'll surround the location while using smokespinners to mask our movements..." - Caitlyn
name: Ambush

description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: <link=vocab.Manifest><style=Vocab>Manifest</style></link> a 6+ cost spell from your regions.
descriptionRaw: Play: Manifest a 6+ cost spell from your regions.
flavorText:
"About the only good part of Ferros financing my work was getting to team up with Reggie. Not only is the man one of the most competent people I've ever worked with, he's a heck of a guy, too."
- Excerpt from Jayce's journal
name: Ferros Financier

description: Plant 2 <link=card.shuffle><style=AssociatedCard>Flashbomb Traps</style></link> randomly in the top 8 cards of the enemy deck.
descriptionRaw: Plant 2 Flashbomb Traps randomly in the top 8 cards of the enemy deck.
flavorText: "On my signal." - Caitlyn
name: Advanced Intel

description: <link=keyword.PlaySkillMark><sprite name=SkillMark><style=Keyword>Play</style></link>: Plant 5 <link=card.shuffle><style=AssociatedCard>Flashbomb Traps</style></link> randomly or activate the effects of all traps in the top 5 cards of the enemy deck.
descriptionRaw: Play: Plant 5 Flashbomb Traps randomly or activate the effects of all traps in the top 5 cards of the enemy deck.
flavorText: Corina smiled as the Piltover Wardens burst down her door, as they trampled her precious flowers underfoot, as they sent up clouds of toxic pollen. All as planned.
name: Corina, Mastermind

description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: Plant 5 <link=card.shuffle><style=AssociatedCard>Flashbomb Traps</style></link> randomly in the top 5 cards of the enemy deck.
descriptionRaw: Play: Plant 5 Flashbomb Traps randomly in the top 5 cards of the enemy deck.
flavorText: "Watch your step..." - Corina Veraza
name: Beguiling Blossom

description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: Activate the effects of all traps in the top 5 cards of the enemy deck.
descriptionRaw: Play: Activate the effects of all traps in the top 5 cards of the enemy deck.
flavorText: "Right where I want you." - Corina Veraza
name: Volatile Bloom

description: ALL players draw 2.
descriptionRaw: ALL players draw 2.
flavorText: "This a popular case, you know. Just had a chap in here earlier looking at it. Enjoy!" - Station Archivist
name: Insider Knowledge

description: Deal 1 damage to a random ally.
descriptionRaw: Deal 1 damage to a random ally.
flavorText: "Boom." - Caitlyn
name: Flashbomb Trap

description: When I am summoned, summon a <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Forge Worker</style></link>. When you play a 6+ cost spell, destroy me and refill your spell mana.
descriptionRaw: When I am summoned, summon a Forge Worker. When you play a 6+ cost spell, destroy me and refill your spell mana.
flavorText: If Piltover is a city driven by invention, then its forges are its engines.
name: The Forge Of Tomorrow

description: <link=vocab.Strike><style=Vocab>Strike</style></link>: Refill 1 spell mana.
descriptionRaw: Strike: Refill 1 spell mana.
flavorText: "Takes two things to get an idea off the page and into your hands. Funding's one half of the equation, the other's a good forge. And it's not just the tools or the hardware in the forge; if your chief doesn't have what it takes to run things, well, your idea's staying on paper." - Jayce
name: Forge Chief

description: <link=vocab.Strike><style=Vocab>Strike</style></link>: Plant 2 <link=card.shuffle><style=AssociatedCard>Flashbomb Traps</style></link> randomly in the top 8 cards in the enemy deck.
descriptionRaw: Strike: Plant 2 Flashbomb Traps randomly in the top 8 cards in the enemy deck.
levelupDescription: 5 of your traps have been activated.<style=Variable></style>
levelupDescriptionRaw: 5 of your traps have been activated.
flavorText: Caitlyn was always a dogged and thorough investigator, a quality that helped propel her fast through the ranks of Piltover enforcement. But when a case concerning a certain 'C' came along, one that countless other enforcers had abandoned, it seemed almost as though Caitlyn had finally met her match. Almost.
name: Caitlyn

description: When I’m summoned, create a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Most Wanted</style></link> in hand.
descriptionRaw: When I’m summoned, create a Most Wanted in hand.
flavorText: From unloading silently into the street to prepping the ram, setup didn't take long. It was just a matter of waiting on Caitlyn's cue.
name: Officer Squad

description: <link=vocab.NexusStrike><style=Vocab>Nexus Strike</style></link>: Plant 2 <link=card.shuffle><style=AssociatedCard>Flashbomb Traps</style></link> randomly in the top 8 cards of the enemy deck.
descriptionRaw: Nexus Strike: Plant 2 Flashbomb Traps randomly in the top 8 cards of the enemy deck.
flavorText: Zayne Asako, like all Zaunite kids, had to grow up fast on those violent and dark understreets. After losing his brother to yet another senseless gang crime, he committed himself to Piltover enforcement, hoping reason and law would make his home finally safe.
name: Sting Officer

description: Place an enemy follower into the enemy deck, then your opponent draws 1.
descriptionRaw: Place an enemy follower into the enemy deck, then your opponent draws 1.
flavorText: The grand city of Piltover is home to some of the finest minds in Runeterra. Piltover's jails are also home to some of the finest minds in Runeterra.
name: Coup de Grace

description: When you draw or create me in hand or each <link=vocab.RoundStart><style=Vocab>Round Start</style></link>: while I'm in your hand, transform me into a random 6+ cost spell.
descriptionRaw: When you draw or create me in hand or each Round Start: while I'm in your hand, transform me into a random 6+ cost spell.
flavorText:
"...configuring hextech into a stable state was the most difficult hurdle I faced. Most nights, it felt like the crystals and hexite were actively conspiring to trip me up, and it was only through extensive trial and error that I was able to get the component parts working in harmony..."
- Excerpt from Jayce's journal
name: Hextech Anomaly

description: Grant me +2|+0 once you've play a 6+ cost spell this game.
descriptionRaw: Grant me +2|+0 once you've play a 6+ cost spell this game.
flavorText: "The people of this city worship at the feet of 'intelligence'. But what good is the greatest mind without the means to express itself? No. I will show Piltover true greatness. It will tower over them. It will blot out the sun. And it will carry my name." - Albus Ferros
name: Ferros Skycruiser

description: Deal 3 to an enemy and 1 to all other enemies.
descriptionRaw: Deal 3 to an enemy and 1 to all other enemies.
flavorText: "They're supposed to go up, not EVERYWHERE! Oh, my!" - Heimerdinger
name: Rocket Barrage

description: <link=keyword.Last Breath><sprite name=LastBreath><style=Keyword>Last Breath</style></link>: Create a copy of me in the enemy deck with 2 <link=card.shuffle><style=AssociatedCard>Poison Puffcaps</style></link> attached.
descriptionRaw: Last Breath: Create a copy of me in the enemy deck with 2 Poison Puffcaps attached.
flavorText: The stink of a whump in the height of puffcap season is unlike any other. Imagine an open sewer full of week-old fish and rotten eggs, and you're halfway there.
name: Stinky Whump

description: <link=vocab.Strike><style=Vocab>Strike</style></link>: Plant 4 <link=card.shuffle><style=AssociatedCard>Flashbomb Traps</style></link> randomly in the top 8 cards in the enemy deck and deal damage to the enemy Nexus equal to the number of your traps activated this round. <style=Variable></style>
descriptionRaw: Strike: Plant 4 Flashbomb Traps randomly in the top 8 cards in the enemy deck and deal damage to the enemy Nexus equal to the number of your traps activated this round.
flavorText: She burst in, leveled her rifle at the culprit, and looked down the scope. There, smiling through the looking glass, was a familiar face.
name: Caitlyn

description:
Deal 2 to a unit and plant 2 <link=card.shuffle><style=AssociatedCard>Flashbomb Traps</style></link> randomly in the top 8 cards of the enemy deck.
Create a <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Caitlyn</style></link> in your deck.
descriptionRaw:
Deal 2 to a unit and plant 2 Flashbomb Traps randomly in the top 8 cards of the enemy deck.
Create a Caitlyn in your deck.
flavorText: "Here's MY calling card." - Caitlyn
name: Caitlyn's Piltover Peacemaker

description: Grant Tech allies <link=vocab.Everywhere><style=Vocab>everywhere</style></link> +1|+1 once you've played a 6+ cost spell this game.
descriptionRaw: Grant Tech allies everywhere +1|+1 once you've played a 6+ cost spell this game.
flavorText: The Hextech Handler was initially constructed to transport raw materials through Piltover, but as time went on, the locals apparently developed a soft spot for him. Jayce's forge crew nicknamed him Nugget, a Piltovan lord reportedly donated a hat, and passing kids now adorn him with whatever they have to hand.
name: Hextech Handler

description: <link=vocab.RoundStart><style=Vocab>Round Start</style></link>: Create in hand a <link=keyword.Fleeting><sprite name=Fleeting><style=Keyword>Fleeting</style></link> copy of a non-<link=keyword.Fleeting><sprite name=Fleeting><style=Keyword>Fleeting</style></link> spell you played last round.
descriptionRaw: Round Start: Create in hand a Fleeting copy of a non-Fleeting spell you played last round.
flavorText: The Blessed Isles forget. The Shadow Isles remember. The Shadow Isles forget. The Blessed Isles remember.
name: Catalogue of Regrets

description: Each round, the first time you <link=vocab.Slay><style=Vocab>slay</style></link> a unit with a spell, summon an <link=keyword.Ephemeral><sprite name=Ephemeral><style=Keyword>Ephemeral</style></link> <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Mistwraith</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Each round, the first time you slay a unit with a spell, summon an Ephemeral Mistwraith.
flavorText: The Black Mist traps its victims in endless cycles of self-imposed torment. Through the Mistcatchers, Tek and Kana give those souls a chance to break that cycle for themselves.
name: Mistkeepers

description: When I'm summoned or <link=vocab.Attack><style=Vocab>Attack</style></link>: Create a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Darkness</style></link> in hand if you don't have one. Your damage and kill spells accelerate to <link=keyword.Fast><sprite name=Fast><style=Keyword>Fast</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned or Attack: Create a Darkness in hand if you don't have one. Your damage and kill spells accelerate to Fast.
levelupDescription: I've seen you <link=vocab.Slay><style=Vocab>slay</style></link> 3+ units with spells or an allied Lucian die<style=Variable></style>.
levelupDescriptionRaw: I've seen you slay 3+ units with spells or an allied Lucian die.
flavorText: "To be a Sentinel is to fight. To lose yourself or to lose the ones you love. But more than that? It means to live. For yourself... and for the ones you love."
name: Senna

description: Kill a unit and give all enemies <nobr>-2|-0</nobr> this round.
descriptionRaw: Kill a unit and give all enemies -2|-0 this round.
flavorText: "No shadow without light. No death without life." - Senna
name: Dawning Shadow

description: Each round, the first time you <link=vocab.Slay><style=Vocab>slay</style></link> a unit with a spell, deal 2 to the enemy Nexus.
descriptionRaw: Each round, the first time you slay a unit with a spell, deal 2 to the enemy Nexus.
flavorText: "Pups is pups." - Wisdom scrawled upon the soul
name: Watcher on the Isles

description: When I'm summoned, create a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Darkness</style></link> in hand if you don't have one.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, create a Darkness in hand if you don't have one.
flavorText: "I can feel the sun no longer. Even so, I wield its memory--and that is enough."
name: Solari Sentinel

description: When I'm summoned, create a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Darkness</style></link> in hand if you don't have one. When you play your next <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Darkness</style></link> this round, copy it targeting the enemy Nexus.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, create a Darkness in hand if you don't have one. When you play your next Darkness this round, copy it targeting the enemy Nexus.
flavorText: "You asked me, Senna, what brought me to this fight. I have lost nothing to the Mist, it does not threaten my home. It exists, and it should not. I am here to discover why. Do I need sentiment to join your cause?"
name: Ixtali Sentinel

description: <link=keyword.Drain><style=Keyword>Drain</style></link> 5 from a unit.
descriptionRaw: Drain 5 from a unit.
flavorText: "Death is drawn to life." - Senna
name: Piercing Darkness

description: <style=Variable>Deal 2 to an enemy.</style>
descriptionRaw: Deal 2 to an enemy.
flavorText: There is a little of fear in everything. It lays quietly at the heart of mystery. It is the spark of joy in awe and wonder. It grants life its purpose - death, its power. It is everything. It is nothing.
name: Darkness

description: When I'm summoned, create a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Darkness</style></link> in hand if you don't have one. Your next <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Darkness</style></link> this round costs 0 and gains “I deal damage to all enemy targets.”
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, create a Darkness in hand if you don't have one. Your next Darkness this round costs 0 and gains “I deal damage to all enemy targets.”
flavorText:
"Another nightmare?"
"Wasn't all bad. You weren't there."
"Dolt. What was the bad part?"
"You weren't there."
name: Dess & Ada

description: When I'm summoned or <link=vocab.Attack><style=Vocab>Attack</style></link>: Create a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Darkness</style></link> in hand if you don't have one. Your damage and kill spells accelerate to <link=keyword.Fast><sprite name=Fast><style=Keyword>Fast</style></link> and cost 1 less.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned or Attack: Create a Darkness in hand if you don't have one. Your damage and kill spells accelerate to Fast and cost 1 less.
flavorText: "We were wrong. The Black Mist isn't heartless. It's not random. It has a goal. But that means we can track it. Means it can bleed."
name: Senna

description:
Kill a unit and give all enemies <nobr>-2|-0</nobr> this round.
Create a <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Senna</style></link> in your deck.
descriptionRaw:
Kill a unit and give all enemies -2|-0 this round.
Create a Senna in your deck.
flavorText: "No shadow without light. No death without life." - Senna
name: Senna's Dawning Shadow

description: The first time you <link=vocab.Slay><style=Vocab>slay</style></link> a unit with a spell, grant me +2|+1.
descriptionRaw: The first time you slay a unit with a spell, grant me +2|+1.
flavorText: What must the Mist see when it looks upon Maeve? Exuberance, confidence--irrepressible optimism. How it must long to snuff that taunting flame. For what can death fear, but life?
name: Burgeoning Sentinel

description: The first time you <link=vocab.Slay><style=Vocab>slay</style></link> a unit with a spell, grant me +2|+1.
descriptionRaw: The first time you slay a unit with a spell, grant me +2|+1.
flavorText: The Buhru and Sentinel philosophy align on a single crucial point: all things must end, and some must be made to end.
name: Buhru Sentinel

description: When I'm summoned, if you've targeted allies in 4 different rounds, grant me <link=keyword.SpellShield><sprite name=SpellShield><style=Keyword>Spellshield</style></link>, <link=keyword.Overwhelm><sprite name=Overwhelm><style=Keyword>Overwhelm</style></link>, and <link=keyword.Challenger><sprite name=Challenger><style=Keyword>Challenger</style></link>. <style=Variable></style>
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, if you've targeted allies in 4 different rounds, grant me Spellshield, Overwhelm, and Challenger.
flavorText: For centuries, the demon Camphor stalked the lands of Targon, pulling from her victims the very strengths that defined them. From the mighty, she would take strength; from the wise, wisdom. But she had no interest in these boons. Instead, she feasted on the suffering, doubt, and misery she inflicted. Camphor was a monster in every sense of the word.
name: Camphor, the Doubt

flavorText: "Targonians need no further proof of the gods' cruelty. Look at what they have done to us. Look at what they have done to our most cherished companions." - Pantheon
name: Wounded Whiteflame

description: Grant an ally +1|+1 and <link=keyword.Stun><sprite name=Stunned><style=Keyword>Stun</style></link> an enemy.
descriptionRaw: Grant an ally +1|+1 and Stun an enemy.
flavorText: Pantheon was well-versed in warfare. He knew from countless fights that his enemies would always track his spear, and rarely his shield.
name: Shield Vault

description: <link=keyword.Stun><sprite name=Stunned><style=Keyword>Stun</style></link> two enemies.
descriptionRaw: Stun two enemies.
flavorText: "Targon's night sky is a wondrous thing of unimaginable beauty. It is all too easy to lose oneself gazing at that expanse, not knowing how far the stars stretch, and what manner of being might be looking back..." - Targonian climber
name: Celestial Wonder

levelupDescription: You've targeted allies in 5 different rounds<style=Variable></style>.
levelupDescriptionRaw: You've targeted allies in 5 different rounds.
flavorText: Here stands Atreus, who had his freedoms stripped from him by the very Aspects he revered. Here stands the embers of War, who left Atreus with gifts few mortals can comprehend. Here stands a man, ready to fight and die for those he cherishes.
name: Pantheon

description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: Give an ally <link=keyword.SpellShield><sprite name=SpellShield><style=Keyword>Spellshield</style></link> and <link=keyword.Overwhelm><sprite name=Overwhelm><style=Keyword>Overwhelm</style></link> this round.
descriptionRaw: Play: Give an ally Spellshield and Overwhelm this round.
flavorText: Iula still remembers the burning grief that coursed through her after she learned of her husband's death. When Pantheon came to her, asking if she would help him destroy a creature that feasted on this very pain, her answer was swift.
name: Iula

description: Grant 2 allies +2|+2.
descriptionRaw: Grant 2 allies +2|+2.
flavorText: Warring against the gods seemed a fool's errand, but through the scars and through the screams, those brave few learned lessons. The gods thought singularly, selfishly, and had lost the gift of camaraderie. This would be their weapon. This would be their armor.
name: Battle Bonds

description: Once a <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Pantheon</style></link> has leveled up, grant me a random keyword for each round you've targeted allies this game. <style=Variable></style>
descriptionRaw: Once a Pantheon has leveled up, grant me a random keyword for each round you've targeted allies this game.
flavorText: Here stands Pantheon, who took up his spear and swore to drive all gods and demons from this land we call home.
name: Pantheon

description:
Grant an ally +1|+1 and <link=keyword.Stun><sprite name=Stunned><style=Keyword>Stun</style></link> an enemy.
Create a <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Pantheon</style></link> in your deck.
descriptionRaw:
Grant an ally +1|+1 and Stun an enemy.
Create a Pantheon in your deck.
flavorText: Pantheon was well-versed in warfare. He knew from countless fights that his enemies would always track his spear, and rarely his shield.
name: Pantheon's Shield Vault

description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: Grant an ally +1|+1 and <link=vocab.Silence><style=Vocab>Silence</style></link> an enemy follower.
descriptionRaw: Play: Grant an ally +1|+1 and Silence an enemy follower.
flavorText: Eshiyme was once a revered oracle who used her Sight to guide those in need. But this gift was stolen from her by Camphor, who intended to feast on her inevitable anguish. How sorely the demon underestimated brave Eshiyme.
name: Blinded Mystic

description: Give 2 allies +1|+2 this round.
descriptionRaw: Give 2 allies +1|+2 this round.
flavorText: "It is in the bonds of kinship that we must find our strength." - Pantheon
name: We Stand Together

description: When I'm summoned or <link=vocab.Attack><style=Vocab>Attack</style></link>: Create a <link=card.create><style=AssociatedCard>Gem</style></link> in hand.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned or Attack: Create a Gem in hand.
flavorText: The colossi are ancient and venerated protectors of Targon's most revered sites. To harm them is to insult the mountain itself. To torture them is a crime no Targonian can forgive.
name: Freed Colossus

description: If your opponent has more units than you, grant an ally +1|+1 for each extra unit they have.
descriptionRaw: If your opponent has more units than you, grant an ally +1|+1 for each extra unit they have.
flavorText: These brave few knew they were stepping into warfare with beings of unimaginable power. They knew death was likely. But still, they stepped.
name: Against the Odds

flavorText: Tor felt his life fading with every heartbeat, but in that grave and looming darkness, where he was expected to embrace dread, he instead found purpose. He would not only face death willingly, but would bring with him the very demon who had dared to cut his life short. This is how he would be remembered. This would be Tor's saga.
name: Saga Seeker

description:
When I'm summoned, swap my Health and your Nexus' Health. 
I can't be blocked by enemies with less Health than me.
descriptionRaw:
When I'm summoned, swap my Health and your Nexus' Health. 
I can't be blocked by enemies with less Health than me.
flavorText:
"An honorable tribute to those gone, but never forgotten: When the people of Demacia see the sun's rays shining off his form, they will know hope, and the indomitable spirit that inspired his construction will live on through him." 
- Durand workshop plaque
name: Gorlith the Unscalable

description: When I'm summoned, grant other allies +0|+3.
descriptionRaw: When I'm summoned, grant other allies +0|+3.
levelupDescription: <link=vocab.RoundEnd><style=Vocab>Round End</style></link>: Your allies have 25+ total Health.<style=Variable></style>
levelupDescriptionRaw: Round End: Your allies have 25+ total Health.
flavorText: For many years after his creation, Galio lay dormant, unfeeling, unknowing. It wasn't until magic brought him to life and he experienced the resulting thrill of battle that he knew the joy of being among the living. Now, when he slept, he missed such wonderful things!
name: Galio

description: Grant an ally +0|+3. At the next <link=vocab.RoundStart><style=Vocab>Round Start</style></link>, grant it +0|+2. Create a <link=card.level1><style=AssociatedCard>Galio</style></link> in your deck.
descriptionRaw: Grant an ally +0|+3. At the next Round Start, grant it +0|+2. Create a Galio in your deck.
flavorText: Even the sight of Galio is enough to inspire the noble hearts of Demacians.
name: Galio's Shield of Durand

description:
When I'm summoned, grant other allies +0|+3. 
Each round, the first time an ally takes damage, <link=vocab.Rally><style=Vocab>Rally</style></link>.
descriptionRaw:
When I'm summoned, grant other allies +0|+3. 
Each round, the first time an ally takes damage, Rally.
flavorText: When he awoke, Galio was overjoyed to find a whole family had been crafted for him, a facsimile of the same family that would carry on the legacy of his maker for years to come. They were just like him - they wouldn't break.
name: Galio

description: Grant an ally +0|+3. At the next <link=vocab.RoundStart><style=Vocab>Round Start</style></link>, grant it +0|+2.
descriptionRaw: Grant an ally +0|+3. At the next Round Start, grant it +0|+2.
flavorText: Even the sight of Galio is enough to inspire the noble hearts of Demacians.
name: Shield of Durand

description: To play, spend all of your mana. Summon a <link=card.summon><style=AssociatedCard>Dauntless Vanguard</style></link> and grow its stats to that amount. If 9+ mana was spent, grant other allied Elites +2|+2.
descriptionRaw: To play, spend all of your mana. Summon a Dauntless Vanguard and grow its stats to that amount. If 9+ mana was spent, grant other allied Elites +2|+2.
flavorText: When it seems all hope is lost, the soldiers of Demacia look to the Vanguard.
name: Might of the Vanguard

description: Fully heal an ally. Then, that ally and an enemy <link=vocab.Strike><style=Vocab>strike</style></link> each other.
descriptionRaw: Fully heal an ally. Then, that ally and an enemy strike each other.
flavorText: "Let's crack on, then!" - Galio
name: Winds of War

description: When you summon another ally, grant it +0|+1.
descriptionRaw: When you summon another ally, grant it +0|+1.
flavorText: "It may not be evident to the untrained, but the work of a great artist is in one chip of the chisel to the next."
name: Durand Sculptor

description: <link=vocab.Support><style=Vocab>Support</style></link>: I take all damage for my supported ally this round.
descriptionRaw: Support: I take all damage for my supported ally this round.
flavorText: Following the stag-mounted Ranger's lead, the petricite guardian dwarfed the very creature that had inspired its elegant design.
name: Petricite Stag

description: <link=keyword.Fury><sprite name=Fury><style=Keyword>Fury</style></link> grants me +0|+2 instead of +1|+1.
descriptionRaw: Fury grants me +0|+2 instead of +1|+1.
flavorText: The placid mountain drakes are slow to anger despite their appearance, and their stoicism around other mountain beasts makes them natural protectors of otherwise vulnerable flocks.
name: Mountain Drake

description: <link=vocab.Support><style=Vocab>Support</style></link>: Give my supported ally +0|+2 and <link=keyword.Formidable><sprite name=Formidable><style=Keyword>Formidable</style></link> this round.
descriptionRaw: Support: Give my supported ally +0|+2 and Formidable this round.
flavorText: "The Ranger Elmheart has brought us grim news," the architect said calmly, focusing on rerolling the parchment to hide how his hands shook. He turned to the waiting sculptors and gave them a stiff nod. "It seems the time has come for Demacia's unseen protectors to come out of hiding."
name: Durand Architect

description: <link=vocab.Play><style=Vocab>Play</style></link>: Grant an ally +0|+1 and <link=keyword.Tough><sprite name=Tough><style=Keyword>Tough</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: Play: Grant an ally +0|+1 and Tough.
flavorText: Shireen looked up from her work at the sound of pounding hoofbeats. The ranger's haste left her uneasy, but curious. She urged her petricite bird to take flight, and followed in the ranger's wake.
name: Durand Protege

flavorText: As the Broadwing passed overhead, the battered Demacian soldiers below let out a cheer, inspired by its enduring form.
name: Petricite Broadwing

flavorText: "It's always a joy to see them come to life. You forget how distinct each is, their personalities reflections of the artist who made them." - Durand Sculptor
name: Petricite Hound
